name: @0xshariq/package-installer
description: A cross-platform, interactive CLI to scaffold modern web app templates with framework, language, UI, bundler support and feature integration.

files.standalone: standalone/index.js (ESM bundle for direct Node.js execution)

bundleContents.allDependencies: All npm dependencies bundled using ESM format
bundleContents.templates: Complete template library for React, Next.js, Vue, Angular, etc.
bundleContents.features: Feature definitions for auth, database, AWS, Docker, etc.
bundleContents.crossPlatform: Native executables for Linux, macOS, and Windows
bundleContents.noWarnings: ESM-only bundle eliminates import.meta compatibility issues
